GSD.product_version: versions from v5.19 to before v5.19.2
GSD.description:
KVM: x86/xen: Stop Xen timer before changing IRQ

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.2 by commit 53283a3333c07e44475c3659c3700dc33400267f, it was introduced in version v5.19 by commit 536395260582be7443b0b35b0bbb89ffe3947f62. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: KVM: x86/xen: Stop Xen timer before changing IRQ
